issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

In Base UI->Views->Hi-Res Image remote the image does not display and instead there is a label saying *Test only valid on retina devices*, this is because the image is only shown if Ti.Platform.displayCaps.density is equal to *high* and the 6 Plus returns *xhigh*.

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Install KitchenSink onto a iPhone 6 plus
2. Navigate to Base UI->Views->Hi-Res Image remote

h5.Actual Result

The image will not display due to 'it not being a retina display'

h5.Expected Result

The image should display
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Base UI->Views->Hi-Res Image remote does not display on iPhone 6+
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.10.1
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.1.201410281743
Titanium SDK build: 3.5.0.v20141217134117
Titanium CLI, build: 3.4.1
Alloy: 1.5.1
Xcode 6.1.1
iPhone 6 Plus (8.1)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
